tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: XII Financial Report Taxonomy
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: This is an extension taxonomy created for reporting XBRL International Inc's financial report. The taxonomy imports US-GAAP 2017 taxonomy and XBRL International's LEI (CR) taxonomy.
